name: Hidden Field Trap
desc: Invisible input field. Bots may fill it, humans won't.

name: Fake Button Trap
desc: Looks like a real button, but only bots click it.

name: Recursive Form Trap
desc: Hidden form inside another form. Bots may submit both.

name: Randomized CAPTCHA Trap
desc: CAPTCHA with random logic. Bots may fail to solve it.

name: Behavior Puzzle Trap
desc: Background puzzle only humans solve.

name: Tokenization Bomb Trap
desc: Hidden repetitive text to confuse parsers.

name: Fake Login Flow Trap
desc: Fake login page to catch bots.

name: False 200 OK Trap
desc: Fake 200 OK response, logs bot activity.

name: Dynamic HTML Mutation Trap
desc: DOM mutates after load. Bots miss changes.

name: Tab Switch Trap
desc: Detects bots that never switch tabs.

name: Cookie Anomaly Trap
desc: Sets strange cookies, bots mishandle them.

name: Resource Loading Trap
desc: Fake assets that bots skip loading.

name: Adversarial Prompt Trap
desc: Malformed HTML/JSON to break AI parsing.

name: AudioContext Fingerprint Trap
desc: Uses Audio API to detect headless browsers.

name: Reverse Turing Trap
desc: Detects absence of human mistakes.

name: Time Delay Trap
desc: Detects abnormal timing between actions.

name: CSS Visibility Trap
desc: Elements hidden via CSS that bots may still interact with.

name: Browser Fingerprint Trap
desc: Detects inconsistent browser fingerprints.

name: Mouse Movement Trap
desc: Tracks non-human mouse movement patterns.

name: Keyboard Pattern Trap
desc: Detects non-human typing patterns.

name: WebGL Fingerprint Trap
desc: Uses WebGL to detect headless browsers.
